answers.answer: Well that depends on your lifestyle.  Are you sexually active?  What kind of sickness are you having?  Nausea?  Are you getting these symptoms every day?  You may find that around the time of your period you may feel those symptoms.  Anemia can also cause headaches and dizziness.  Problems with your blood sugar could also cause these problems (hypoglycemia, diabetes, etc.).  If you're sexually active and had unprotected sex, pregnancy could also be a cause.  I really can't help you very much without having more details.
i am getting these symptoms everyday and it is since i had a miscarrage

title: dizzieness and headaches and sickness
